OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

params.array: An array of two uint256 elements.

returns.result: The Poseidon hash of the two elements.

returns.result: The Poseidon hash of the three elements.

The Poseidon hash of the two elements.

params._encPubKey: the encryption public key to be hashed

returns.msgHash: The hash of the message and the encryption public key

params._stateLeaf: the state leaf to be hashed

returns.ciphertext: The hash of the state leaf

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

returns.msgHash: The hash of the padded message and encryption key

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

returns.result: The SHA256 hash of the array.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

MESSAGE_DATA_LENGTH().notice: the length of a MACI message

hash2(uint256[2]).notice: Computes the Poseidon hash of two uint256 elements.

hash3(uint256[3]).notice: Computes the Poseidon hash of three uint256 elements.

hash4(uint256[4]).notice: Computes the Poseidon hash of four uint256 elements.

hash5(uint256[5]).notice: Computes the Poseidon hash of five uint256 elements.

hashLeftRight(uint256,uint256).notice: Computes the Poseidon hash of two uint256 elements.

hashMessageAndEncPubKey((uint256[10]),(u.notice: An utility function used to hash a MACI message and an encryption public key

hashStateLeaf(((uint256,uint256),uint256.notice: An utility function used to hash a state leaf

padAndHashMessage(uint256[2]).notice: An utility function used to pad and hash a MACI message

sha256Hash(uint256[]).notice: Computes the SHA256 hash of an array of uint256 elements.
